submission:
from sortedcontainers import SortedDict

class Solution:
    def getResults(self, queries: List[List[int]]) -> List[bool]:
        dists = SortedDict()
        dists[0] = 0
        
        def update_dists(x: int) -> None:
            idx = dists.bisect(x)
            prev_x = dists.keys()[idx - 1]
            prev_max_dist = dists[prev_x]
            
            if idx >= len(dists):
                dists[x] = max(prev_max_dist, x - prev_x)
                return
            
            next_x = dists.keys()[idx]
            next_max_dist = dists[next_x]
            dists[x] = max(prev_max_dist, x - prev_x)
            dists[next_x] = max(dists[x], next_x - x)
            
            if next_max_dist <= next_x - prev_x:
                last = next_x
                for i in dists.islice(idx + 2, len(dists) + 1):
                    dists[i] = max(dists[last], i - last)
                    if i - last >= next_x - prev_x:
                        break
                    last = i
        
        def check_max_dist(x: int, target: int) -> bool:
            idx = dists.bisect(x)
            prev_x = dists.keys()[idx - 1]
            max_dist = max(dists[prev_x], x - prev_x)
            # print(f"\t max_dist = max({dists[prev_x]=}, {(x - prev_x)=}) = {max_dist}")
            return target <= max_dist
        
        # print("==============")
        results = []
        for q in queries:
            # print(f"{q=}")
            if q[0] == 1:
                update_dists(q[1])
                # print(f"{dists=}")
            elif q[0] == 2:
                results.append(check_max_dist(q[1], q[2]))
                # print(f"{results[-1]=}")
            else:
                raise ValueError("Unknown query")
        return results
